course.title: Experiments and Politics
course.description: Description: Intended for undergraduates who are contemplating using experimental research in their senior thesis. The course is a blend of substance and methodology: we will look at famous political science experiments, primarily drawn from the field of American Politics, to get a sense of what can be done with this method. The students will also be introduced to the methods involved in doing good experimental research, and will leave the course prepared to run their own experiments.
